original_title: Requests made to release Indian eggs to the local market
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The Sri Lanka State Trading (General) Corporation has requested for permission from the Food Advisory Committee to release the eggs imported from India to the local market.

Plans are in place to supply the eggs to supermarkets, following discussions with the Department of Animal Production and Health, Chairman of the Sri Lanka State Trading (General) Corporation Asiri Valisundara said.
The eggs imported from India are yet to be released to the market, he pointed out.
